backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and story comparison utilities, including distance calculation via Haversine, for the backend actor with mixin-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping removed wallpaper features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH variables, light/dark theme tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and sets geolocation permissions policy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, view routing, wallpaper cleanup, and UI interactivity safeguards.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Story creation dialog with fields, location handling, image upload, and draft management features.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryFAB.t: Floating action button that triggers opening the story creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/DistanceKmSlider: Reusable slider component for selecting a distance range in kilometers with optional inactive state.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: Search and category filter bar with input, clear button, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication handling, and profile dropdown.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Leaflet-based interactive map showing stories, user location, and temporary markers.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time users to set a username and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/SortControl.tsx: Dropdown control for selecting story sorting options, including nearest sorting.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview with actions like like, pin, comment, and share.
frontend/src/components/StoryDetailDialo: Detailed story dialog with comments, likes, pins, reporting, admin actions, and view tracking.
frontend/src/components/StoryFeed.tsx: Renders a grid of StoryCards or empty/loading states based on story data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDrafts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating story drafts using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocationPermiss: Manages browser geolocation permission state, errors, and requesting location with diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client creation, login flow, identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various data-fetching and mutation hooks for user profiles, admin checks, stories, and related backend operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallpaper.ts: Empty placeholder file for wallpaper-related hook logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus layout and dialog interaction rules.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Maps story categories to human-readable labels and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/lib/distanceFilterDebug.ts: Provides opt-in localStorage-based debug logging for distance filtering decisions and exposes controls on window.
frontend/src/lib/locationFilter.ts: Checks whether a story is within a given radius using Haversine distance and logs debug info.
Defines UI copy for various geolocation permission states and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/storySorting.ts: Implements story sorting by date, views, likes, pins, or nearest location and converts options to backend format.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility functions including class merging, Haversine distance calculation, and distance formatting.
frontend/src/lib/wallpaperValidation.ts: Empty placeholder module with no implementation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page managing story search, location permissions, filtering, sorting, and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page showing posted, liked, and pinned stories with tabs, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and features related to removing and disabling the wallpaper functionality, including pending requests.
